top_categories.workout_context: At 100 miles, Standard Deluxe Dirt Road Century punishes athletes who haven’t trained their body to produce power when glycogen runs low.
Standard Deluxe Dirt Road Century rewards athletes who can hold sustained power without blowing up — threshold is the engine that drives everything above Zone 2.
Standard Deluxe Dirt Road Century’s alabama dirt roads, rolling hills demands rapid power changes — surge over obstacles, settle on smoother sections, repeat for hours.
Racing Standard Deluxe Dirt Road Century isn’t just fitness — it’s pacing, fueling, and executing when conditions deteriorate. This workout practices the race itself.
The G-Spot zone (88–92% FTP) is where you’ll spend the hardest sustained miles of Standard Deluxe Dirt Road Century. Make this intensity feel like home.
Over-unders train the lactate clearance you’ll need at Standard Deluxe Dirt Road Century when surges push you above threshold and you have to recover while still riding hard.
Standard Deluxe Dirt Road Century’s alabama rolling hills dirt roads and competitive field demand explosive aerobic capacity — the ability to respond to surges without blowing up.
Every session at Standard Deluxe Dirt Road Century intensity builds on this aerobic foundation — the endurance base is the soil everything else grows in.
At 100 miles, Standard Deluxe Dirt Road Century rewards a massive aerobic engine. This volume work builds the fat-oxidation capacity that keeps you moving when glycogen runs low.
Blended sessions combine endurance with intensity spikes — exactly what Standard Deluxe Dirt Road Century’s alabama rolling hills dirt roads delivers on race day.
Critical power determines how long you can sustain above-threshold efforts at Standard Deluxe Dirt Road Century — a higher CP means more time in the red before failure.
The Norwegian double-threshold method builds the sustained power base for Standard Deluxe Dirt Road Century — massive training stimulus without the recovery cost of VO2max work.

race_overlay.nutrition: Target 60–80g carbs/hour for Standard Deluxe Dirt Road Century’s 100 miles. Start fueling within the first 30 minutes — early fueling prevents late-race collapse. Bonking at mile 60 is a nutrition failure, not a fitness failure.
race_overlay.terrain: Mixed terrain at Standard Deluxe Dirt Road Century requires surface adaptability. Include weekly rides on alabama rolling hills dirt roads to build confidence. Expect: alabama dirt roads, rolling hills, 100-mile distance.

pack_summary: This 10-workout pack focuses on Durability, TT Threshold, and Gravel Specific to prepare you for 100 miles of alabama rolling hills dirt roads in Waverly, Alabama.
